segments.text: I see the sink is overflowing, water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right in front of it, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the growing puddle, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how unaware she seems of the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the constant flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin those cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry someone will slip and get hurt on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire kitchen is becoming a small flood zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression is unnerving given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather depressing sight, this domestic disaster unfolding unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would point out the problem to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This carelessness is quite frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside starkly contrasts with this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just feels wrong somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR
